pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, April 14, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Media appearance

10:35 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio’s Kelowna Daybreak South.
